import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import { Header, Icon, Grid, Card } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import Clock from 'react-live-clock'; import io from 'socket.io-client' const pageStyle = { marginLeft: '45px', marginTop: '45px', marginRight: '65px', color: '#4E80A2' } const timeStyle = { textAlign: 'right' } const timeTextStyle = { fontSize: '60px', color: "#ffffff" } const topHeaderStyle = { fontSize: '90px', color: "#ffffff" } const choreHeaderStyle = { fontSize: '45px', color: "#ffffff" } const cardStyle = { backgroundColor: "#4E80A2", color: "#ffffff" } const cardHeaderStyle = { fontSize: '55px' } const App = () => (
Welcome to Berton Avenue
